text: and Regeneration, Tower Hamlets Town Hall, 160 Whitechapel Road, London, E1 1BJ Tower Hamlets Local Plan 15 INTRODUCTION 6.7 Your representation should be supported by evidence wherever relevant. It will be helpful if you also say precisely how you think the plan should be modified. To ensure an effective examination, it is important that the inspector and all other participants in the examination process are able to know who has made representations on the plan. Therefore, when completing the response form it is vital you provide your name and contact details. 6.8 You can help by: z Forwarding information of this project to people, groups, or organisations you think may be interested; z Making a post on social media to help spread the word; and z Sharing feedback on how weâ€™re consulting on this project.
